metadata.title: USN-5408-1 -- Dnsmasq vulnerability
metadata.description: Petr Menšík and Richard Johnson discovered that Dnsmasq incorrectly handled certain inputs. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code or expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5408-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  dnsmasq - 2.79-1ubuntu0.6 dnsmasq-utils - 2.79-1ubuntu0.6 dnsmasq-base-lua - 2.79-1ubuntu0.6 dnsmasq-base - 2.79-1ubuntu0.6 No subscription required
